name: Jelly Juggle
description:
An exciting new extreme sport for you thumb!

Go for gold in all 12 events:
- Mellow Melon
- Blueberry
- Lemon
- Strawberry
- Lemon & Strawberry
- Tropical Medley
- Bubblegum
- Green Tea and Butterscotch
- Lime
- Lime & Raspberry
- Rainbow Blackcurrant
- Cherry and Cola
plus a mystery bonus event!
